Package com.model

Class Soldier

java.lang.Object
com.model.Soldier
Direct Known Subclasses:
EliteSoldier, WarMaster
public class Soldier
extends java.lang.Object
This class represent a soldier.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addObserver​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
    Add observer.
    void addObserver​(java.lang.String property, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
    Add an observer.
    void attack​(java.util.List<Soldier> soldiers)
    Attack.
    boolean canBeMoved()
    Check if a soldier can be moved.
    A soldier can be moved if :
    - he hasn't been assigned yet
    - he belongs to the controller of a field and the field has at least 2 soldiers of the controller
    He cannot be moved if :
    - He died
    - The battle in the field he is in is still going

    Gets ai.

  • Constructor Details

    • Soldier

      public Soldier()
      Instantiates a new Soldier. A soldier can attack, heal another and rest between rounds.

      Returns:
      the assigned field

    • canBeMoved

      public boolean canBeMoved()
      Check if a soldier can be moved.
      A soldier can be moved if :
      - he hasn't been assigned yet
      - he belongs to the controller of a field and the field has at least 2 soldiers of the controller
      He cannot be moved if :
      - He died
      - The battle in the field he is in is still going
      Returns:
      true if he can change field, false otherwise

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Is alive boolean.
      Returns:
      the boolean
